== Muriyad (627895) ==

Muriyad is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 776 hectares and harbouring 1978 households with total population of 7662 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Irinjalakuda]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3620 and female population is 4042. Scheduled Caste Population is 1808 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the village is 627895<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
